name: Pyromancers Quest
description:
***Disclaimer***

This is my first game, so it's bit of a bug fest, still playable and fun (in my opinion) though

***Disclaimer***

You are a freelance pyromancer on a quest for glory, riches and power. On your way to the fabled school of pyromancy your ship is waylaid by the dreaded Necromancer and you and your crew are forced to dock on a mysterious island. From there you must fight giant spiders, skeletons and other generic monsters to defeat the Necromancer and set things straight!

WASD- Movement

U-Push objects

I-Use your magical throwing sword

O-Use your magical shield

P- Super power
